name: Lost Island (yungghibli)
description:
Lost Island is a first person open world exploration game about collecting items scattered around the world.  On your adventure your pall "BoxBoy" will follow you around and make sure all your items are safe. This is a hand-crafted, cell-shaded game with a huge focus on  hand-painted textures and  creating a beautiful island. 

This game was a 5-week solo project and it was my first solo game, so it was huge learning experience. I m so happy with how it came out and i hope you enjoy it too.If you're interested in following any of my other artwork or future games pop me a follow on my Instagram.

https://www.instagram.com/dantekennedygeorge/?hl=en

Music by by wellingtons greatest producer 

Jerome Jordan https://www.instagram.com/imjeromejordan/
